entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023
